meta.description:
TLD: PL
Language Tag: pl-PL
Language Description: Polish
Version: 6.0
Effective Date: 11 September 2004
    

Registry: NASK
Contact: Andrzej Bartosiewicz andrzejb@nask.pl, Krzysztof Olesik kolesik@nask.pl
Address: Wawozowa 18 Str, 02-796 Warsaw, Poland
Tel: +48 22 52 31 200 Fax: +48 22 52 31 301
Website: http://www.nask.pl/nask_en/, http://www.dns.pl/english/

Relevant Policy Document URL: http://www.dns.pl/IDN/draft-bartosiewicz-idn-pltld-06.txt

This document presents language character table for Polish language created by NASK (Research and Academic Computer Network) - .PL ccTLD registry. Full policy of IDNs registration is presented in the internet draft "Registering Internationalized Domain Names under .PL" A. Bartosiewicz (http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-bartosiewicz-idn-pltld-06.txt)
